actions.text: Amendment SA 3379 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 33 - 63. Record Vote Number: 212.

Amendment SA 3379 proposed by Senator Flake to Amendment SA 3378. (consideration: CR S3975-3979, S3982; text: CR S3975) To make the appointment and certification of a new local board permissible instead of required.
Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 3379 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 33 - 63. Record Vote Number: 212.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 3379 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 33 - 63. Record Vote Number: 212.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3379 proposed by Senator Flake to Amendment SA 3378.

amends_amendment.purpose: In the nature of a substitute.

purpose: To make the appointment and certification of a new local board permissible instead of required.
